short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: DraftCheck is the only extension for Google Docs developed to save you from the monotony of contract review.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Automated Review

Catch all drafting errors with one-click. DraftCheckâ€™s machine learning tool surfaces formatting errors, cross-references, term-definitions, inconsistencies and more, accelerating contract review.
Mitigate risk, cut costs, and drive efficiency.

Continuous Scanning

As you correct drafting errors, DraftCheck continues to run scans in the background to ensure your changes are being tracked and related errors resolved.
